articles.title: American held captive in Afghanistan for more than 2 years is released in prisoner swap - CNN
articles.description: Mark Frerichs, an American held captive in Afghanistan for more than two years, has been released in a prisoner swap, a senior Biden administration official confirmed Monday.
articles.content:
(CNN)Mark Frerichs, an American held captive in Afghanistan for more than two years, has been released in a prisoner swap, a senior Biden administration official confirmed Monday.

articles.title: Hurricane Fiona makes landfall in Dominican Republic as most of Puerto Rico remains without power - CNN
articles.description: Hurricane Fiona made landfall in the Dominican Republic early Monday after slamming Puerto Rico with heavy rain, life-threatening flooding and an islandwide power outage.
